title: Codon chart with RNA questions, 5 answer options 3

content.description: The following questions refer to the following DNA strand and table of codons.
content.question: In which of the following would there NOT be a change in the amino acid sequence of the peptide coded for by this DNA?

choices.label: Deleting the first A from 3’ AAA 5’
